description: M.G. Thamara Vs. M.H. Wasanthi Mallika - Hon. K.T. Chitrasiri, J before  Duty of the Primary Court Judge to settle the dispute under Section 66(6) of the Primary Court Procedure Act is not Mandatory.
parties: M.G. Thamara Vs. M.H. Wasanthi Mallika - Hon. K.T. Chitrasiri, J
judgement_by: Duty of the Primary Court Judge to settle the dispute under Section 66(6) of the Primary Court Procedure Act is not Mandatory.
